meanings.definition: In a splendid or dazzling manner.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks lit up the night sky resplendently.
meanings.sent2: The chandelier in the ballroom sparkled resplendently.
meanings.sent3: The clown's outfit was so bright that it shone resplendently under the stage lights.
meanings.sent4: Her smile beamed resplendently, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun set resplendently over the horizon, painting the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The resplendent stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The resplendent diamond necklace caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The resplendent garden was a sight to behold in full bloom.
meanings.sent4: Her resplendent gown outshone all others at the ball.
meanings.sent5: The resplendent sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.sent1: The resplendent gemstone glowed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The resplendent dew on the leaves glistened in the morning light.
meanings.sent3: The resplendent trophy gleamed on the mantelpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her resplendent smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The resplendent moon cast a silvery glow over the landscape.
